cause.description:
The Feed A Fat Filipino Fund is an organization to help feed people who do not have food in the Philippines.
1. There are a ton of people that live in boxes and are poor.
2. They need more than rice to get the right nutrition they need
3. Not many Filipinos can afford food.
cause.mission: Feed Filipinos; give food to other Filipinos who aren't fat
cause.name: Feed A Fat Filipino Fund
